page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT AND LEISURE
page.content: {Employment.} Only a small percentage of the local people rely on the immediate area for employment; most travel to Swindon, Cirencester, Cheltenham or even as far as London. A small number of people come into the area to work, mainly in gravel extraction and associated indusrty. {Leisure facilities.} The area is ideally situated for leisure time activities. The{ {Cotswolds}are just a few miles away with opportunities for walking, and exploring in beautiful villages and towns. Within a radius of a mile there are facilities for most water sports, including water skiing, power boat racing, canoeing, sailing, wind surfing and angling. Local stables provide opportunities for horse riding.
